```{r}
# Apartat 1
m = rnorm(20, 175, 10)

# Apartat 2
mitjana = mean(m)
variancia = var(m)
desv_std = sqrt(variancia)

# Apartat 3
IC_95 = c(mitjana-qnorm(0.025, lower.tail=FALSE)*10/sqrt(20), mitjana+qnorm(0.025, lower.tail=FALSE)*10/sqrt(20))
print(IC_95)

# Apartat 4
IC_99 = c(mitjana-qnorm(0.005, lower.tail=FALSE)*10/sqrt(20), mitjana+qnorm(0.005, lower.tail=FALSE)*10/sqrt(20))
print(IC_99)

#Apartat 5
IC_95_sigma = c(mitjana-qt(0.025, 19, lower.tail = FALSE)*desv_std/sqrt(20), mitjana+qt(0.025, 19, lower.tail = FALSE)*desv_std/sqrt(20))
print(IC_95_sigma)

# Alternativament, R calcula autom√†ticament l'interval ambq
t.test(m)

```
